name: BlueChannel, Inc.
description: BlueChannel is a boutique web development company based in Colorado. We specialize in building custom web apps, eCommerce solutions, and WordPress websites. We're a full-service development company and provide hosting as well as domain name management. We have a 20-year track record and our clients appreciate that we're customer service focused and responsive. You can learn more about our company at http://www.bluechannel.com.
